page.title: 01Domesday Introduction.
page.content: Our block is mainly rural with some very muddy footpaths through the fields,nearly all puddles in April.No snakes were seen and no lives were lost.Less than a quarter is housing, comprising two villages;the larger one,Stainforth has about 7500 people. The smaller,Fishlake about 1000. Stainforth ,as Stenforde is mentioned in the first Domesday Book.The first houses in Stainforth were near the river Don,and then the canal,because of the importance of canal traffic.Our village stainforth used to be one of the main stops on the Don.Stainforth has a market charter dating from 1348.Hatfield Colliery was first started in 1911.From 1926 the population soared because people flooded in from other areas to work in the pit.
